sense.def:
A store
je trgovina, največkrat velika.

To store things
pomeni stvari nekje pustiti, dokler jih ne potrebujemo.

seg.quote: The tool kit is stored under the seat.
...storing water for use in the dry season.

sense.def:
To store information
pomeni ohraniti podatke v spominu, kartoteki ali na računalniku.

seg.quote: ...stored as images in the minds of people.
...pocket calculators which can store telephone numbers.

sense.def:
A store
je tudi zaloga nečesa, kar nekam spravimo, dokler tistega ne potrebujemo.

seg.quote: ...emergency stores of food and medical equipment.

sense.def:
A store
je tudi kraj, kjer so stvari shranjene, medtem ko niso v rabi.

seg.quote: ...weapon stores in which nuclear warheads were kept.
Goods in store will be insured for loss or damage.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in store for someone
, se mu bo v prihodnosti zgodilo.

seg.quote: You never know what the next few months have got in store.

sense.def:
To set great store on or by something
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj izjemno pomembno ali potrebno.

seg.quote: He set the greatest store on carrying out his decision.

sense.def:
To store something up
pomeni nekaj shraniti, dokler ne mislimo, da je pravi čas, da tisto uporabimo.

seg.quote: She had some sausage carefully stored up for the occasion.
